alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 8:01PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison, eastern Hancock and western Jackson Counties through 1000 PM CST... At 801 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Perkinston to near Slidell. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, St. Martin, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Latimer, Kiln, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Saucier, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 8 and 59. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 3 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
